text: Yego narod stal prepirat'sya s nim, i togda on skazal: Â«Neuzheli vy stanete prepirat'sya so mnoy otnositel'no Allakha, v to vremya kak On nastavil menya na pryamoy put'? I ya ne boyus' tekh, kogo vy priobshchayete v sotovarishchi k Nemu, yesli tol'ko moy Gospod' ne pozhelayet chego-libo. Moy Gospod' ob"yemlet znaniyem vsyakuyu veshch'. Neuzheli vy ne pomyanite nazidaniye
